page.title: 18SHOPS AND SERVICES
page.content: The main shopping streets in Crickhowell are{HIGH STREET}and {BEAUFORT STREET . Most of the shops are{non-specialist general stores. There are a few banks and estate agents and only one very small supermarket.There are also a large number of pubs, for its size. Almost all the shops are small, often with houses between them. They offer {personal service}and{convenience goods.{ { Parking}is limited, with only one car park which is some distance from the main shopping centre although parking is allowed on the main streets. In the last 30 years, due to a change in shopping habits (Bulk buying,Use of freezers and monthly paying),people go out of the town to larger{supermarkets in{Abergavenny}and elsewhere.
